Package sage.scene

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Controller
    The base class for Controllers, which are objects that can be attached to, and affect, SceneNodes.
    Group
    A Group is a SceneNode which has no screen representation but rather contains a set of (zero or more) children, each of which can in turn be a SceneNode -- meaning either another (sub-)Group or a Leaf.
    HUDImage
    HUDImage defines a HUDObject which consists of a Texture mapped Rectangle located in the camera's viewport.
    HUDObject
    HUDObject defines a SceneNode which resides on the "HUD" (Heads-Up Display) -- that is, on the screen "in front of" normal Scenegraph (game-world) objects.
    HUDString
    HUDString defines a HUDObject which consists of a String.
    Leaf
    This class is an abstraction for SceneNodes which are leaves of the gameworld scenegraph; it defines functionality common to all types of scenegraph Leaf nodes.
    Material
    This class defines an abstraction for Material objects -- that is, objects defining a material which can be applied to scene elements.
    Model3DTriMesh
    Model3DTriMesh extends TriMesh by incorporating support for model animation data and an associated Texture.
    RotationController
    RotationController is a Controller that applies a continuous (wrapping) rotation to each SceneNode it controls.
    SceneNode
    SceneNode is the abstract parent class for all nodes in the application (game) scene graph.
    SkyBox
    A SkyBox is a Group made of textured quads that simulates having a sky, horizon and ground around a scene.
    TranslationController
    A SAGE scenenode controller that applies a cyclic translation to each node it controls.
    TriMesh
    TriMesh defines a Leaf consisting of a geometric object made up of triangles defined by a collection of vertices, together with attributes associated with the vertices.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    SceneNode.CULL_MODE
    CULL_MODE defines the manner in which a renderer will handle culling for a given SceneNode.
    SceneNode.RENDER_MODE
    RENDER_MODE defines the render mode queue associated with a given SceneNode object when it is passed to an IRenderer for drawing.
    SkyBox.Face
    An enumeration listing the six faces of the SkyBox by name.
